pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Python' Style String Functions // A comprehensive set of string manipulation functions based on those found in 'Python' without relying on 'reticulate'. It provides functions that intend to (1) make it easier for users familiar with 'Python' to work with strings, (2) reduce the complexity often associated with string operations, (3) and enable users to write more readable and maintainable code that manipulates strings.
